1.title: The Wiseguy Kitchen: Dinner with the Mob
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Big Vinny a NY Mob Boss looses the girl of his dreams because of his Mob life style , he throws it all away to become The Wise Guy Chef and he host a weekly cooking show "Dinner With The Mob" it becomes a big hit and he wins back the girl and becomes a Celebrity Chef.
imdb.title: Dinner with the Mob
plot: NYC Retired mob boss loses the love of his life so he gives up the life of crime for the life of cooking and becomes the star of The Wiseguy Kitchen; a popular weekly cooking show.::vincent fiore

Big Vinny a NY Mob Boss looses the girl of his dreams because of his Mob life style , he throws it all away to become The Wise Guy Chef and he host a weekly cooking show "Dinner With The Mob" it becomes a big hit and he wins back the girl and becomes a Celebrity Chef.::vincent fiore

Mob Boss Big Vinny retires from the life of crime and becomes a celebrity chef with a popular weekly cooking show The Wiseguy Kitchens "Dinner With The Mob". Vinny wants to go legit while is boys have other plans, he cooks, sings and dances his way into the heart of Maria his lost love.::vincent fiore
